email.description: Member's email address from Zoho CRM

handle.description: Unique public identifier for the member, used in article URLs. Cannot be changed once set.

role_id.description: Reference to Role entity - determines base permissions

role_effective_from.description: Effective date for the current role assignment (e.g., when an Alumni member retired)

last_login.description: Last time the member logged in

last_activity.description: Last activity/engagement timestamp in the portal

login_enabled.description: Whether this member is allowed to login to the portal

member_excluded_features.description: Additional feature IDs excluded for this specific member (in addition to role exclusions)

has_seen_onboarding_tour.description: Whether the member has completed the onboarding tour

page_tours_seen.description: Tracks which page-specific tours the member has seen (e.g., {"BuyProgramTickets": true})

show_in_directory.description: Whether this member should appear in the public member directory
